member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionEval
member.summary: Provides members for evaluating expressions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionEval.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionEval.Evaluate(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Wrapper.IDTSVariableDispenser100,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Evaluates the expression and returns the yield.
member.returns: The value that describes the yield of the evaluation.
member.param: true to indicate that the expression value is assigned to a property; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionEval.Expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression to be evaluated.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionEval.IsBoolean(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Wrapper.IDTSVariableDispenser100)
member.summary: Determines whether the expression yields a value.
member.returns: true if the expression yields a value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionEval.Validate(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Wrapper.IDTSVariableDispenser100)
member.summary: Verifies that the expression is properly constructed.
member.returns: Returns that describes the result of the validation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask
member.summary: Contains the members used to configure and run an Expression task.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.AcceptBreakpointManager(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.BreakpointManager)
member.summary: Called by the run-time engine when a task or container is created, and is passed a to enable the task to create, remove, and check the status of breakpoints. This method is called by the runtime and is not used in code.
member.param: The breakpoint manager specific to this task.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.DebugMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates whether a task should determine whether breakpoints are enabled.
member.returns: true if the task should determine whether breakpoints are enabled; false if the task can ignore all breakpoints.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.Execute(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSComponentEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging,System.Object)
member.summary: Runs the task.
member.param: The transaction object that the task is part of. This value can be null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.ExecutionValue
member.summary: Returns the result of the task execution.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.Expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the expression to be executed by the task.
member.returns: The expression to be executed by the task.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.LoadFromXML(System.Xml.XmlElement,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents)
member.summary: Loads the definition of the task, in XML format, from the XML definition of the package.
member.param: The node that contains the information to be loaded.
An object that implements the interface for raising events during persistence.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.ResumeExecution
member.summary: Resumes execution of the task after pausing. The task or container is resumed by the runtime engine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.SaveToXML(System.Xml.XmlDocument,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSInfoEvents)
member.summary: Saves the definition of the task, in XML format, into the XML definition of the package.
member.param: The XML document to which to save the information.
An object that implements the interface for raising events (errors, warnings, and so on) during persistence.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.SuspendExecution
member.summary: Indicates that the executable needs to suspend. This method is called by the runtime engine.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.SuspendRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates whether tasks should suspend when they encounter a breakpoint. This value is set by the runtime engine for tasks and containers when a breakpoint is encountered.
member.returns: true if the task suspends when it encounters a breakpoint; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.Validate(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSComponentEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging)
member.summary: Verifies that the task is properly configured.
member.param: A collection of used by the task.
An object that implements the interface.
An object that implements the interface.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.ExpressionTask.ExpressionTask.ValidateExpression(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser)
member.summary: Verifies that the expression is properly configured.
member.returns: A that describes the result of the validation.
